article.title: UN layout formatting specification for UBL Order Cancellation instances

section.title: Order cancellation formatting specification
section.para: This formatting specification describes a rendering of the UBL Order Cancellation document model according to a subset of the United Nations Layout Key for Trade Documents guidelines for application for the 320 Acknowledgement of Order form:

listitem.para: 320 Acknowledgement of Order: Document acknowledging an undertaking to fulfill an order and confirming conditions or acceptance of conditions.

section.para: For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.

section.title: Status
section.para: This specification has no formal status at this time. It should not be considered a reference interpretation of UBL documents. Feedback is sought from users of stylesheets that implement this formatting specification regarding suggestions for change for consideration by the OASIS UBL committees for incorporation into these formatting specifications.

Presentational semantics may never be formalized or normative in the UBL project due to differing international requirements and conventions for the presentation of information found in business documents. This document contains only examples from a few of what will probably be many available UBL stylesheet libraries.

section.title: Layout order and information
section.para: Items in this formatting specification are ordered roughly from the laid out fields on the form in the order left-to-right, top to bottom.

Important: the rendering of a number of fields is very simplified, reflecting a Western European interpretation of a subset of fields (as in names and addresses). User requirements need to be better understood for the level of granularity in these formatting specifications.

section.title: Miscellaneous information
section.para: The following information is unrelated to the visible fields of the form.

section.title: Document header information
section.para: This information shows up in the window-title bar of the HTML browser, and in the document title supported by some XSL-FO processors.

section.title: Party information
section.para: Header information is associated with the form as a whole, not to the individual items of goods.

section.title: Seller
section.para: This field is intended to show the name and address of the buyer of goods or the originator of the documents, as the case may be.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Cancellation number
section.para: This number is a unique number assigned to the order cancellation by the buyer.

section.title: Date
section.para: This field states the date of the order cancellation.

section.title: Purchase order date
section.para: This fields provides the issue date of the original order

section.title: Buyer's reference
section.para: This field provides the buyer's reference to the original order.

section.title: Seller's reference
section.para: This field provides a seller assigned reference to the order corresponding to this order cancellation.

section.title: Consignee
section.para: At this time this field is not being used in the order cancellation.

section.title: Buyer
section.para: These fields are used to provide the name and address of the buyer of the goods involved in the transaction.
Note that only one of cbc:CountrySubentity and cac:CountrySubentityCode need be used, with preference to cbc:CountrySubentity if it exists.

section.title: Cancellation reason
section.para: This free format text field is used to provide the reason for the cancellation of the referenced order.

section.title: Response
section.para: This field indicates if the sender of the cancellation requires a response to this message, if the indicator returns true then 'Response Required' would be printed in this form field, if the indicator returns false then 'No Response Required' would be printed.

section.title: Cancellation notes
section.para: This free format text field is used to provide any other information that may be relevant to the cancellation.
